title: Why do we not have a dont put this person on my team list
body:
Seriously the name says it all.

The current system to stop trolls etc is useless. I mean it punishes people who bite at trolls messing with them.

Why cant we a have a this person is acting like a moron so dont put them in my games list not just an ignore list.

Basically fixes all the problems for them, they dont need to review anything and we dont need to play with morons?

replies.body: Because at high elo everyone keeps vs each other so you could just put all them on the list for elo
